name: EditorMusic
description: Music in your editor, what's not to like?

extra-songs-path.name: Extra songs path
extra-songs-path.description: If this is set to a path, EditorMusic will take songs from here as well as the config folder.

low-pass.name: Enable low-pass filter
low-pass.description: Enable or disable the low-pass filter that makes the sound "muffled" when you go deeper into menus.

menulayer-load.name: Menulayer load
menulayer-load.description: Makes song loading start when you enter the main menu, instead of when the mod loads.

enable-log.name: Enable logging
enable-log.description: Enables logging for easier debugging - will make very large log sizes!!!
